data: Mr. Kingston, as soon as he received Mrs. Thornleyâ€™s invitation, sent a telegram to her nearest post-town, to tell her he would start for Adelonga on the following day, and await at the inn where he left the railway the buggy she was kind enough to say should be sent to meet him.
A Mere Chance: A Novel. Vol. 2
